titleStmt.title: The male of the flock, or A sermon preached at St. Pauls, before the right honourable, the Lord Mayor, and the right vvorshipfull, the aldermen of the city of London, Septemb: the 9th: 1655. By Benjamin Agas, minister of Cheneyes in Bucks.
titleStmt.author: Agas, Benjamin.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A:N. for Henry Eversden, at the Greyhound in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
